# AC3

**Enumeration Case**

The AC-3 format.

## Declaration

```swift
AC3
```

## Discussion

This format uses no flags.

## AC-3 Formats

- **AC360958**: The AC-3 format, packaged for transport over an IEC 60958-compliant digital audio interface.
- **EnhancedAC3**: The Enhanced AC-3 format.
